direction.raw_text: . Invoke. But keep moving
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My dad was never that devout. Often his mind was on other stuff. As the chanting builds, a little thought-bubble appears next to the communal imagination: An image of Norma J NORMA J. (Sings)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: wanna be loved by you, alone and nobody else by you boo boo pee doo" WISHFUL raises his head, breaking the seal. A little puff of steam escapes
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Amen to that honey (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa, pal! Ya lettin' out the heat! Penguins around him start jostling to close the gap
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Quit shovin'! ...Hey watch where you're putting your feet
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brothers, BROTHERS! The Devotions! An egg rolls out of the HUDDLE and onto the ICE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no! I dropped it! Where's my egg! WISHFUL barges out of the huddle, retrieves the egg and waddles back into the warmth again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: S'okay. S'okay. No harm done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess he was wrong about a lot of things. Pulling back, till the powerful rhythmic chanting is drowned out by the HOWLING GALE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I did learnt this from him:    the power of positive thinking We are moving in again, towards the huddle, the voices of the Great Male Gathering begin to cut through the wind blasts. Louder and louder, until...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By the power of our Devotions...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We turn the world once more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By our devotion to the Wisdoms (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We bring back the sun. The CHANTING crescendos, awe-inspiring, as it rises above the sound of the gale, and, as if in response THE EARTH TURNS! The CURTAIN OF DARKNESS which overshadows Antarctica begins to LIFT from the curvature of the southern hemisphere. The vast ice-continent is BRILLIANTLY ILLUMINATED once more. ON THE ICE SHELF The ICE itself is moaning and groaning, like a living thing. A SINGLE CRACK appears and widens, then forks and forks again. The whole expanse of fast-ice is DISINTEGRATING, starting at the sea-ice and progressing towards the ice-cliffs. Somewhere an ICEBERG breaks free from the face of a glacier and smashes down into the frozen sea below. At the same time... THE EMPEROR COMMUNITY An EGG cracks open, then another, then all in a rush, like POPCORN. Fathers are calling out to each other as their fluffy CHICKS emerge to greet the daylight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...It's   a   boy! ...It's   a   girl! ...What   a   peach! ...What   a   bruiser! Amongst the excited crowd of males and hatchlings we find WISHFUL staring down at his egg still balanced on his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Late opener, huh? You thinks its alive?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll say. Listen... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: He taps the egg with his beak. Bending close they hear a TAPPING SOUND in REPLY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, how about that? WISHFUL taps again. The tapping comes back louder. A TINY FOOT pops out of the egg. Then ANOTHER. The Egg flips and lurches off in a giddy DANCE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa li'l buddy, slow down! THE FRIENDLY PENGUIN'S chick giggles at the DANCING EGG, which finally trips and cracks, depositing baby MUMBLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hopping from one foot to the other) Ow! Freezy, Fuh-Fuh-Freeezy! All Freezy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Jees! ...You ever see a chick move like that before? ...is he damaged? ...is he deranged? They gather round staring down at this strange little jigging ball of fluff
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Come on. He'll grow out of it. Shovelling MUMBLE off the ice and into his BROOD POUCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come here, li'l Mumble. Let's get you warm and toasty. Mumble SNUGGLES contentedly between his father's legs, surveying his new world. The friend's chick, ELLA is staring at him fascinated
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get him to do it again Daddy
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shh. Quiet (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2) She disappears under his brood pouch
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looks up) So What happens now, Dad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We Wait THE ICE A LONG LINE of male penguins, thousands of them, all with their chicks, stand staring expectantly across the ice shelf. At the front, we find WISHFUL and MUMBLE, who is jiggling with anticipation, hopping from one foot to the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is she coming soon?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any day now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me again what she's like
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sings) a wiggle when she walks, a giggle when she talks, makes my world go round.... MUMBLE does a little SOFT SHOE SHUFFLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sharply) Hey. Thought I told you not to do that
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry. When I get happy my feet get happy too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well tell em don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Why Dad? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Caruso waddles past: A stern glance down at little Mumble as he carries on along the line
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: `Cos it ain't penguin. LATER MIST rises off the ice shelf. The males are still waiting with their chicks. Over this: The sound of Chicks crying. MUMBLE between his father's feet, follows his father's concentrated gaze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gee I'm hungry
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone's hungry son. The mommas are bringing fish soon. Long pause
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's fish look like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll see it when she brings one STILL LATER The baby penguins are HOWLING now. Anxious fathers lean forward, peering into the distance. Out of the thickening mist, a cluster of little BLACK DOTS materialises.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Wives-ho! Wives-ho! ...Hubba-hubba! Wives-ho! ...Better late than never. The distant females look exhausted as they totter unsteadily across the ice towards their partners. The MALES break ranks and rush towards the distressed females.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Barbra-Ann! ...Peggy Sue! (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hey Paula! ...Roxanne!! A tumult of re-unions as partners find each other. But no luck for WISHFUL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .?! Weaving anxiously through the throng, overhearing:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not as fat as I thought you'd be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was pretty slim pickings. Something's happened I tell you
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even the squid were hard to get We had to swim forever
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone split up. A lot of the gals never made it back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Delilah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Gloria?! Gloria??! WISHFUL, is running frantically through the crowd, singing all the time in the hope of being recogniosed
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Since my baby left me. I found a new place to dwell. Down the bottom of lonely street at heartbreak hotel MUMBLE hippity-hops after his father, trying to keep up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woah I'm so lonely baby. I'm so lonely baby. I'm so lonely I could... Moving beyond the crowd, WISHFUL sees a last few stragglers. Amongst them... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (overcome) O Honey. O Baby. You made it! She staggers into his waiting flippers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You hurt?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (breathless) Just tired and hungry is all. It was dreadful out there.... Over WISHFUL' shoulder, she sees the infant Mumble HIPPITY- HOPPING towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But who's this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I called him Mumble. Mumbles feet start to tap involuntarily, Then he catches his dad's warning look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did she get one. Did she bring one back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a little krill that's all
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I see it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Later, bud. Give your ma time to regurgitate
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw. But isn't he just a darling?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yells ecstatically) I got one! I got a mum everyone. I got a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE GREAT COMMUTE The ICE-SHELF is as busy as a freeway at peak hour with males and females are hurrying BACK AND FORTH from the sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After that, with food being so scarce everyone was busy busy busy. Mom and dad were working so hard I didn't see much of them. Besides I had school to go to. THE CRECHE An efficient, caring TEACHER is giving a lesson to a class of about thirty young chicks grouped in front of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Settle class. Settle. We will begin with the most important lesson you will ever learn. Now does anyone know what that is? MANY flippers go up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Michael?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't eat yellow snow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: True but, that's not it. Mumble?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Swimming? Catching Food?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyone else? Mumble looks astonished. What's more important than that
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's our Heartsong, Miss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Heartsong. Yes. The melody you hear inside, the thing that makes you different from every other penguin. So. Let's all be very still now and listen. And when you hear your song, let it come out. Who's first. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: A few flippers go up
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me! Me! I've got one! (sings)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: can't get no...satisfaction.... I can't get no...girly action..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well Michael, if you think that's really you. What have you got for us, Ella?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sings) Voulez-vous coucher avec moi...ce soir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughs) That doesn't make any sense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well Mumble...perhaps you can do better
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mine is more sort of a... He hesitates, as if listening to something in his head.Then, he sings UTTERLY TUNELESS, like a drum solo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bim bam-a-loolah a bim bam bom
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You heard that in there? Mumble is still going. TITTERS and SNIGGERS from the class.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You like it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dear, that's not even a tune.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, a tune is like... (she sings a scale) La la la la la la la la. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, La la la la la A croaky monotone.   The class LAUGHS OPENLY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (getting worried) Listen carefully, Mumble. La la la la la la la la!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: La la la la la la la la!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (emphatically) La La La La La La La La!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But that's what I'm doing, The class fall about in HYSTERICS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whats funny? (genuinely perplexed) What's funny? LATER MUMBLE's PARENTS are talking to the TEACHER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto) It's bizarre. I don't understand it. Did anything happen - you know...- during early development?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. All fine. Normal incubation, wasn't it honey? Wishful shuffles guiltily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well Yeah, it was a kinda...a tough winter I guess, and he did hatch a little late, but... (at a loss.) Is there really nothing we can do? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course there is. Thats why we have Mrs Astrakhan. MRS ASTRAKHAN'S Some distance from the creche, MUMBLE stands with MRS ASTRAKHAN, a Russian-accented remedial teacher.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ? Rubbeesh. Every little pengvin has a sonk. Vhen I have feenished, your singink vill be givink everyone the goosepeempel. CU on MUMBLE looking up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So. Closink the eyes. Liftink chin. Deep breathe here in the downbelow. Now...most important part, find a feelink. Happy feelink, sad feelink, maybe lonely feelink. MUMBLE closes his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm thinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't think EET!! Feel eet! Through the whole body, from the beak right down to tippy-toes. Her voice is seductive, hypnotic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then slowly, very slowly... She hears a strange TAPPING sound and looks down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vhat? Vhat is this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The feet. The jiggy-jog. Don't do eet. Do not move muscle. Rigid like plank, like board. NO MOVINK!!! Now...calm. Remember the feelink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feelink...ok.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And be spontanuous. Once again his feet start twitching uncontrollably.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Stop! No jiggy-jog!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm being spontanuous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not with the feet, with the sonk! You vant to meet beautiful girl? You vant to make the Egg?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well singk! "Ba Ba Bleckship, tvinklestar...La la la la la la, la".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (totally unmusical) "Twinkle, twinkle, little star. How I..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hokay. Enough. Stop. Hokay! Ve go back to the top. Forget the body, look inside the soul. No notes, no sonk, only feelink. Happy feelink. Sad feelink. Enormous feelink, so enormous it fills the whole body. It must escape or you explode! Now, open your leetle beak... Mumble opens his beak, inspired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes, lift up the head! That's it! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2) Mumble inhales, his eyes are shining, his body is shaking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You take a big breath, good and...now! Now! He's off again, DANCING LIKE A FOOL...wild, exuberant, totally uninhibited and unselfconscious. After some time, he remembers himself, stops and turns to the Mrs Astrakhan who is BANGING HER HEAD against a lump of ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Disaster! Catastroff! I never fail! Never! THE ICE SHELF Follow Mumble as he wanders alone, back towards his class. He stops some distance away, listening to the other kids who are now performing with increasing virtuosity. Ella is among them, her clear high voice borne to him on the wind. Mumble sighs and his little shoulders sink, no way he'll ever be able to sing like that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Its tough when you realise you'll never fit in. Plus I was beginning to moult A piece of downy fluff is peeling off one wing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't face the class in this mood So I just kept going. Music over: Walk on By as he wanders through the vast colony head down against the wind, little feet padding over the ice, Gradually the colony begins to thin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looking for what? I don't know? A different type of penguin? The noise of the colony has faded behind him. He stops and looks up. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's exactly what I found. THE EDGE Before him, a wasteland of discoloured ice covered with broken eggs and bits of feather. There are very few penguins here and the ones he can see are all, frankly, weird. A Penguin walks in an endless figure of eight muttering to himself. Another has his flippers wrapped tightly around himself like a straightjacket. A troubled Penguin sings angrily..."There's no business like show business. CU on Mumble. As he looks back to the sanctuary of the colony and then back out over the wasteland
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not the nicest place in the world but at least you could do what you liked here. Fade in Music: (I'm Free by the Who) and Mumble is off, skittering over the rubbish strewn ice, little feet dancing to his hearts content until.... a shadow passes over him and Whump! a huge SKUA BIRD, twice Mumbles size, with a cruel flesh-eating beak, lands on the ice right on front of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, whacha doin' dere flipperbird?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me? Oh, nothing. What are you doing? THREE MORE SKUAS descend. MUMBLE is surrounded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh we just dropped in for a spota lunch. Hey hey hey...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hopefully) Lunch?...There's food? Here? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to others) Leg or wing? Their dark eyes fix on Mumble. He is starting to feel uneasy and backs away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But ...but. I'm a penguin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exackly! De flipperbirds - dat's you - eat de fish. De flyinbirds - dat's me - eat de flipperbird an' de fish. Right now D'ain't no fish -- so...you do the math. The FIRST SKUA moves in on MUMBLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And dis time I'm getting the juicy bits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have juicy bits! Look... all bone and feather! Feel for yourself. They fall over each other, fighting to take up Mumble's invitation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hey, break me off a piec'a dat! ...'Smyturn ta pullimapart ya skanky shit- squirter. ...You! Lastime ya pullimapart ya took all the choice stuff!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! WAIT! The Skuas stop momentarily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every seen anything like this? He does a wild little TAPDANCE hoping to distract them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (unimpressed) Nope. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2) He knocks Mumble down and places his HUGE CLAW on his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ok boys, for once we gonna do dis civilised. Now... The FIRST SKUA opens his beak to strike. Mumble has noticed a YELLOW PLASTIC BAND around the Skua's leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! What's that on your leg? The FIRST SKUA halts his attack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Interesting you should ask?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! No! Don't startim on that! He turns and whacks the other SKUAS over the head with his wing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shaddap! The flipperbird aksed me a question. (fixing Mumble with a crazy bloodshot eye.) I got two words for ya: "Alien Abduction".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (groaning) ... Now of all times ... Always before we eat
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quiet ya ignorant morons! (to Mumble) ...a lotta folks don't believe this but ...dere's somet'in out dere. Creatures. Not like us. Bigger...Fiercer...smarter, too. MUMBLE takes a few steps back, looking for an escape.The FIRST SKUA towering over him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aks me how I know. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: `Cos I bin capturebyem that's how! I seen `em! Mumble keeps backing off, feigning interest...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unbelievable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whaddayamean unbelievable?! It's true! I'm sittin' on a rock, mindin' my own business when suddenly... dere onta me. Dese bein's...like big ugly penguins, fat flabby faces with frontways eyes, no feathers, no beaks...an' dese, dese appendages! Dey probe me, dey tiemeup and strapmedown...dey take dis pointy t'ing and stick it inta me! Den...blackout!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't say
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gets worse! I woke up and there's dis thing on me! (the leg band) Go home and every flyinbird starts dissin' me: `Hey Yellaleg'`What's happenin' Whats that on your leg, Yellaleg?' It was humiliatin'!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At least those aliens didn't eat you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: True. I guess my cries for mercy appealed to their better nature.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So - You think I could appeal to your better nature?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice try kid. But No... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (4) He opens his beak wide as MUMBLE stumbles backwards and falls into a narrow CREVICE in the ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Whatcha think ya doin' down dere flipperbird? Get back up here dis minute! The other Skuas move in to help. MUMBLE cowers in the CRACK as they spear at him with their beaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Come on, out witcha! ...Ya sneaky-ass flipperbird! They can't get hold of him. Frustrated, they turn on the FIRST SKUA, squabbling and whacking each other with their wings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Great, Yellaleg. ...What did we tell ya ...ya leddim geddaway, dincha with ya screwy alientalk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Don't peck me or I'll peck you and when I peck you know you've been pecked...(fade) MUMBLE watches from the safety of the crack as they fight and argue viciously among themselves
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Compared with that, school almost seemed like fun THE CRECHE MUMBLE stands some distance back from where the other young penguins are taking school lessons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Most days I hid at the back, dreaming about the world beyond MUMBLE looks up at a cloud that resolves itself into the unmistakable shape of a FISH. As he watches, the cloud morphs into something that resembles a WHALE. Then morphs again into...a SEAL. Then into the shape of an upright CREATURE with bulging eyes and tentacled hands. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time passed. We all grew up TIME LAPSE As the class transforms into moulting adolescents
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But right up to graduation I never did find my heartsong LATER. THE GRADUATION CEREMONY Dozens of MATURE ADOLESCENTS...their coats almost fully moulted to reveal the sleek, shiny black and white feathers underneath. They stand in a group talking excitedly until the lead penguin, Caruso, walks up and everyone falls silent
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Graduates, today you leave the safety of our community for the first time, forsaking the trusted solid ice for the terrible magic of the deep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Caruso. He couldn't help himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Things are not as they were. For five years now we have known nothing but famine. But you are our hope. Upon your survival depends the very future of the entire Penguin Nation. Dive deep, swim far. May the Great Penguinus go with you. And remember... With solemn gravity, CARUSO throws his flippers into the air and shouts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excelsi-yah! Yah yah yah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excelsi-yah ! Yah yah yah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . AWAY FROM THE CRECHE Follow Mumble as he returns to his parents. In his adult plumage he's distinguishable by a small birthmark, like a bowtie on his chest and a small tuft of down on his head which has not yet moulted off. Music Over: Schools Out by Alice Cooper
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, Ma, can I go with the others NORMA J. puts a protective flipper around her son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know Wishful. I still don't think he's ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad? I'll learn to sing later. I'll find my voice out there. In the deep. Truly. Glancing round he sees the class moves off en masse across the ice...heading for the sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad. Pul-eeeze. Wishful leans forwards, pulls off Mumbles tuft with his beak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeooow!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On you go then, buddy
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks Pop. See ya Ma. He races off, Norma J calling after him:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calling after) Remember `Stranger Danger'! Never talk to a seal! Mumble turns to wave, falls over, gets up and races on after the others with his strange hippity-hop little gait. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Watching from a distance, Norma J wipes away tears
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my. Stupid. I'm sorry... Wishful pats her comfortingly
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly to WISHFUL) ...You think we'll ever see him again
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Shrugs) Its out of our flippers THE HIGHWAY TO THE SEA A high shot reveals the miles of frozen ice that the GRADUATES have to cover to get to the sea. Some are shuffling along on their feet; others are tobogganing. A long way behind them we see the lone figure of MUMBLE racing to catch up. AT THE EDGE OF THE ICE The juvenile penguins stand in a bunch, peering down looking for somewhere to dive in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...What do you think, here? ...Are you kidding? ...How about over here then? They shuffle off in a group to a nearby spot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...That last place looked better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ..I agree. ..Much better. They all shuffle back to the previous spot and stand there, frozen by indecision
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...then again.... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Suddenly the little dark figure of MUMBLE barrels through the pack, yelling
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Outta my way flipperbirds! Coming through!! For a long moment he's airborne. Then...he hits the water with a strangled squawk!...and disappears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...What was that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mumble? They tentatively crane over the edge. No sign of him. They peer into the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Lunatic! ...where did he go? ...See any blood? Then...MUMBLE shoots out of the water like a missile...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatcha waiting for? It's fantast...(splosh) ... as he falls back under water again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go Mumble! Without hesitation ELLA follows him. The others follow ELLA. A few at first, then all of them en masse leap yelling and hollering. SURFACE/ UNDERWATER The penguins flounder around, flapping, laughing, and choking
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had an instinct I'd be good at this. Actually we all were. We were the best.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER Transformed into creatures of grace and exuberance, they swoop and dive trailing plumes of bubbles. Over this: the music of THE BEACH BOYS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Suntanned bodies and the waves of sunshine. Those California girls and the beautiful coastline. In the warmed up weather, let's get together and do it again..." Two PENGUINS shoot up through HOLES IN THE ICE... THE SURFACE Skidding out of control, they COLLIDE, ending up in a breathless heap on top of each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mumble?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ella? They scramble to their feet...but the ice is slippery.They clutch together, slipping and sliding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got you! No I don't. Leaning against each other, they manage to stand up, close now, eyes meeting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes I do. A brief moment then.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi Ella. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only bad thing about being with Ella. It was always so darned crowded. As others pop up all around
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Ella! ...Where da get to? ...there you are! Laughing, she dives into the water. The young males follow her. MUMBLE hippity-hops to the edge and tumbles in after her. UNDERWATER A half dozen of them gambolling together, their bubble trails intertwining...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "In the warmed up weather, let's get together and do it again." Then everyone freezes as a few silvery FISH swim past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...FISH!! They all zero in. Collisions, barging, a bit like water polo when the ball is first thrown in. In an instant...all the fish are taken. ON THE SURFACE MUMBLE surfaces with a fish in his beak
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (muffled) Ella? You get one?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not this time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (muffled) Here, have it. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you Mumble, but it's yours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (muffled) I want you to have it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't I have it Suddenly, A SKUA BIRD swoops down and grabs it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! That's a felony! Mumble, let go! Mumble hangs on. Neither he not the Skua will let go. The SKUA soars higher, taking MUMBLE with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yells) Mumble! MUMBLE is carried...higher and higher. The SKUA tries hard to shake him off, but finally gives up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (derisive) So fly flipperbird. Fly. He lets go the fish and MUMBLE plummets downwards, landing Splat! on an ice floe. ON THE ICE. Mumble lies still Ella and the others gather around. MUMBLE still has the FISH firmly in his beak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Is he breathing? ...he's certainly not eating Leaning forward to take the fish
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Maybe I should just... Mumble regains consciousness (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. The fish is for Ella (to Ella) Take it. Really. Its for you ELLA leans forward, takes the fish, and daintily gulps it down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (spent) You're welcome. ON AN ICEBERG. NIGHT The entire sky is ablaze with the shimmering LIGHTS of the AURORA AUSTRALIS. The PENGUINS stand below, looking up in wonder. They sing:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Gotta keep those lovin' good Vibrations a happenin' with her, "Ahhhhhhhhhhhhh..." The HARMONIES are exquisite until...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (very loud and tuneless)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Good, Good, Good...Good VibRatiOns..." The singing STOPS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Mumble, ...Knock it off. The singing RESUMES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Gotta keep those lovin' good Vibrations A happenin' with her." Another CRESCENDO...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Ahhh..." It's too much for MUMBLE. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...AaahhhhHhhhhhhhhhhhhHhhhhhh..." This stops the whole thing dead. ELLA pads over to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gently) Mumble, the thing is...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. I know
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ....It's better if you just listen. She returns to the choir. The singing resumes...a perfect harmonic MUMBLE can't help himself. He begins to TAP DANCE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (retreating)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! I'll quit. OK! AN ICE-FLOE We find MUMBLE on his own small ice-floe separate from the others on their iceberg. As their singing drifts across to him, MUMBLE does an exquisite little SOFT-SHOE SHUFFLE. TIME LAPSE As night slowly pales to a misty dawn and Mumbles lonely floe drifts off, turning slowly in the current Music Over: "The tracks of my tears" MORNING He is woken by A NUDGE at his little raft of ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sleepily) Woah. Whose there. Another nudge. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: OK. I'm awake now. You got me He looks around - an unfamiliar landscape of ice - then over the side, seeing nothing but slowly spreading ripples. A more VIOLENT NUDGE from behind almost makes him lose his balance. A DARK SHAPE passes swiftly through the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saw you. Richard? Eddie? Ella.... The dark shape SHOOTS out of the water. Its GAPING JAWS missing Mumble by an inch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ......aaarghH! As he recoils, slips and tumbles into the WATER. UNDERWATER/ SURFACE Choking, thrashing and gulping air, Mumble SCRAMBLES to get back onto the ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everybody out!! LEOPARD SEAL!! (glub) The murderous creature comes at him, jaws open, baring rows of sharp TEETH and MUMBLE swims for his life. The LEOPARD SEAL is relentless, barging through smaller floes, powering around larger ones. Mumble just CAN'T SHAKE HIM OFF. Desperate, he shoots up into the air, landing on a THIN PANCAKE OF ICE that cannot support his weight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: HEEEELP!! Mumble scrambles to gain purchase but FALLS BACK INTO THE WATER. Now he is ... UNDER THE ICE SHELF ...caught between the SOLID ICE above him and the bottomless black WATER below. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Mumble POWERS ahead, the ice above growing thicker, the angled ceiling forcing him down, deeper into the BLACKNESS. The Leopard Seal opens its mouth. Its GAPING JAWS are about to engulf Mumble when... a little SPECK OF LIGHT appears in the ceiling of ice. Mumble makes a speedy sharp turn, climbing steeply. He is in a FUNNEL OF ICE...getting narrower and narrower as it rises to the surface. The Leopard Seal is CLOSING fast. MUMBLE shoots THROUGH the hole in the ice and into the air... THE ICE-SHELF A small group of ADELIE PENGUINS recoil as MUMBLE explodes out of the hole, closely followed by the LEOPARD SEAL. WHAM! THUMP! They belly-flop on the ice .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (wincing) ...Ouch! ...That's gotta hurt! ...Who ordered seal? Mumble is quickly on his feet and out of the Leopard Seal's reach. The ADELIES TAUNT the bulky creature like matadors
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Over here ...No over here. Too slow! ...have to lose some weight pesado The frustrated Leopard Seal snaps and snarls impotently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah go chase someone your own size, ya big.......blubberhead. Taunting it with a cheeky little TAP DANCE. The Adelies love it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, amigo. Do that again!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do what? (defensive) I didn't do anything. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That thing with The feet. (to the others) Hola muchachos! (to Mumble) Show them!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...I just kind of go ...like this...and then this... Bolder now, he does a few neat steps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Oye! Ritmo Cubana! ...Riba Riba! Shake those hips! ...Yo penguino, bust a move! They COPY HIM, improvising little riffs on his dance step. The LEOPARD SEAL inches up behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Then mebbe something like... ...No. I got it. Watch me! An Adelie adds an ACROBATIC variation of his own. The LEOPARD SEAL is almost upon them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or how about ... MUMBLE adds a neatly executed slide just as the LEOPARD SEAL strikes. MUMBLE avoids the lunge and the creature's face comes down hard on the ice
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the winded Seal) ...Eat my ice, lardface. ...Kiss my frozen toosh, rubber butt They fall about laughing. The Leopard Seal returns to the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know where you live.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Yeah, it's called The Land, tubby. ...Flop back anytime! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2) Laughing hysterically at their own jokes they strut off. MUMBLE watches them go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hey, ain't you coming, tallboy? ...Or you got something better to do? MUMBLE looks out at the endless sea of floating ice-pancakes, all the way to the horizon. Nothing... He shrugs and hurries off after his new friends. FURTHER ON A strange cacophony building as The four ADELIE AMIGOS and MUMBLE crest the rise, to see... ADELIE LAND A vast, boisterous ADELIE PENGUIN COMMUNITY. Thousands of them, stretching as far as the eye can see. Its very Rio, very samba, worlds away from the sedate Emperor colony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow, there are so many of you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hey, this is nothin'. ...Used to be twice as many of us. ...Yeah, back when you could still catch a fish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The shortage has affected you too?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Who you calling shortish? ...All I know is a lot of us ain't comin' back. ....And Some folks so hungry they eating rocks Sure enough An ADELIE walks by, a PEBBLE in his beak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughing) ...Eating rocks!!? ...That is major funny. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why funny? That's terrible
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Just kidding the rocks are for nest- building ...That's how its works here. The one with the most rocks gets the chicas. ..Chica boom chica boom chica boom boom
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So why aren't you guys collecting them
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ..Cos we got personality!. ...Without us the chicas got no boom boom. ...Without us the fiesta will be a siesta.. ...Watch and learn tallboy. One of the Adelies calls to a pair of YOUNG FEMALES he sees walking by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hola Conchita! The Adelies pose, RUFFLING UP THEIR CRESTS into various styles: the MOHAWK, the FLAT-TOP...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...See something you like? ...trying to top each other, they add HIPPITY-HOPS they've just learned from Mumble. The females are intrigued.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. Cool. Where'd you learn that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...The big guy. ...He from out of town. ...He with us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do it again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Sorry Show's over. (To mumble as they walk off) ...Treat em mean and keep em keen (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...hold back `til the season, when they begging for it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calls after them) Yeah guys, in your dreams
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You see. Some penguins got it, some don't And the Amigos, (in unison) WE GOT IT! They punch and bump each other playfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ....you think I could get some of it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hombre, you got so much already, you dangerous. He touches Mumble and recoils as if burnt
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yow!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really think so?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You got the biggest personality of any of us. ...Except for me, maybe. ...Put that ego away, Ramon, you gonna hurt someone. THE CONGA LINE Music over: Carlos Santana's "Oye Como Va".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So for a while I forgot about finding a song altogether. The Adelies and Mumble form a conga, weaving in and out of the nest builders, aiming a kick here and there at their industrious brethren
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...We were a team the Adelies swoop and dive, corralling a FEW SMALL FISH into a CREVICE. The fish, darting to and fro are suddenly confronted by Mumble's OPEN BEAK. ON THE ICE AGAIN Mumble shares out the catch AN ICEBERG MUMBLE ...there was so much to do, so much to see Mumble and the adeles come shooting down a long curving Slippery dip
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Arriba! ..Addidas amigos! As they shoot off the slippery-dip and into the sea mumble whacks his head on the edge of the ice UNDERWATER The Adelies shoot back up to the surface. Mumble sinks, slightly dazed, watching the kalaeidescope patters of the surface recede. Music Over: "Ground Control to major Tom" ON THE SURFACE ADELIES ...Where's the tall-boy ...I thought he was with you. They jump back in to look for him
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER Mumble keeps sinking, down down down into a great cathedral- like space, lit by eerie shards of underwater light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ....stuff down there beyond my wildest imagining. Imbedded in the base of the glacier, the rusting remains of, An OLD YELLOW EXCAVATOR projecting out of the glacier. It hangs there, inscrutable, like a great yellow totem. Mumble, dwarfed by it, contemplates it for a while, then ventures inside, into the body of the BEAST. INSIDE THE BULLDOZER A rusting steering column, a perforated dashboard. He pecks at the metal, trying to taste it, listening to the sound it makes. OUTSIDE THE BULLDOZER In the shimmering space outside the bulldozer, the ADELIES congregate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... You sure he went in there? ...Mumble! ...Done go near it, looks like it can bite One of them smims closer to the great jaws
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ramos! Mumble pops his head out from between the jaws
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! There you are Terrified the Adelies scatter and shoot to the surface like missiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guys!    I want to speak to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE ICE SHELF The Adelies are heading back to their colony as fast as their little legs will carry then. Mumble Hippity hops after them
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Forget it ...We're not going back there ...Never
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But its dead. It can't hurt you
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Maybe its got a brother still alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But that's what we have to find out. Don't you see. Things like that could be eating the fish. The idea is so stunningly original it stops them in their tracks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Okay. Here's the plan: we go and ask the revered one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Reverend Loveday. ...The One who Knows ...First we gonna need stones though
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why stones? Wait for me LOVEDAY'S MOUND MUMBLE and the ADELIE AMIGOS are bunched together, near the head of a LONG QUEUE of Adelies each with a stone or in their beak. At the head of this queue stands LOVEDAY - guardian of a huge pile of pebbles. His head pokes through one of the rings a PLASTIC SIX-PACK CAN HOLDER festooned with seaweed like a HOLY MANTLE. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: A group of Soul singers, mainly female, sway in the background, singing a soulful song of adoration as the Penguin ahead of Mumble steps forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First, the devotion... The PENGUIN adds his pebble to the pile. LOVEDAY holds up a flipper for silence and a hush falls over the gospel choir
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A moment... (composing himself) ... and your question?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Senor Loveday, My wife is one of the Disappeared ones Tell me is she alive? Loveday hyperventillates, his eyes roll up in his head
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mystic Beings are speaking to me. Yes! She is alive and happy and you are in her thoughts...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But is she with another male?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One pebble, one question. Next! The AMIGOS push MUMBLE forward. He is at least a head taller than the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I sense...you are the one with the question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...How does he do it? ...He just one look and he know. Mumble places the pebble on the pile. A long Pause
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A little nervous? That's normal. Take your time. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2) In fact Mumble is mesmerised by the luight catching LOVEDAY's six pack holder. He bends forwards to study it more closely
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was wondering. Have You ever been abducted by Aliens?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No time wasters. Next!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Senor! That's not his question. He's new here. (prompting Mumble) ...The yellow thing ...Ask him what's taking the fish?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (ignoring them) ...you see I met a Skua once, with something like that on his legs....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Skua? Leg? What's he talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... and he said he was abducted by Aliens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (starts to wheeze and cough) Listen friend, this is my Sacred Talisman, bestowed upon me by the Mystic Beings...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like they bestowed it very tight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...during my Epic Journey of Enlightenment to the Forbidden Shore!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So these Mystic Beings, did you see them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hear them. They talk to me all the time I am their instrument. They chose me to...... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did they have frontways eyes? No feathers? Fat flabby faces? Did they probe you and stick a pointy thing into you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough! How many questions is that? You don't have enough pebbles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Yeah, one pebble, one question. ...We've all got stuff to ask, pal!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I haven't had any answers yet!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !! The Mystic Beings are speaking. They say show some respect stranger. Especially to the One who Knows. A hush falls over the gathering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The reason there are not enough fish is simple: There is not enough love in the world. Love is the answer! One cue the gospel choir start singing: All you need is Love
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over this) Okay, everybody, turn around to the penguin next to you and give them a great big hug. Comeon, everybody...hug! This is a safe place. The gathering hug awkwardly. Mumble, because of his towering height, has trouble embracing the Adelie next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now. The Mating Season starts today so here's what everybody should do: go forth and multiply! If you'll excuse I myself must retire for a moment to the couch of indulgence... okay ladies, who's gonna be first (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (4) MUMBLE and the ADELIES are jostled aside in the STAMPEDE of FEMALES as the gospel group break ranks and mob him
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ..Me Loveday. ..Me! ..No Me !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One at a time! And don't touch the Talisman!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ....I liked him better when he was just plain Pedro. ...Did he say it starts today ...why didn't someone tell us. ...We gotta get to work guys!! They start posturing for the any FEMALES they can attract
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hola Baby! Get your chica boom-boom here. ... Turn round, look at us!. A couple of females look up from the scrum
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...How many rocks you got.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Forget `em honey. They only one between the six of them...and they just spent it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (getting desperate) Wait. Look. The Adelies all start DANCING MADLY, but it is too frenetic, too desperate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You like it ...Arriba! ...What do you need stones for (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (5)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try sitting on the ice for a month. It might come to you Salsa Boy. Come on, Consuela. Rejected, the Amigos stop dancing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Their loss, guys. ...Ramon, where you going? Ramon is SEARCHING frantically for PEBBLES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gotta be some rocks left here somewhere! (to Mumble) Hey big guy, got any love stones over where you come from?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't collect them. All we have to do is , well... We sing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Easy as that? ...So why aren't you over there? Mumble looks at them. Then opens his beak and demonstrates:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: La la la la la la la laaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to each other) ...What's he doing? ...Its a distress call ...Its world music ...Get out of here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See. That's how I ended up with you guys. And emperor who can't sing isn't an emperor at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man. You're an emperor all right, You're a king among emperors. The singing we can fix. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (6)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No problem. Which way's this colony of yours? Leading off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...We'll all come. ...Yeah I like em tall. ...You jus' gotta do exac'ly as I say. THE EMPEROR COLONY It is autumn, the EMPEROR PENGUINS for the mating season. It is just like the GREAT GATHERING we saw at the beginning of our story. Males and females sing their Heartsongs. And ONE SONG stands out from all the others. Where NORMA J. once sang, stands ELLA, now sleek and fully mature. Gathered around her in a semi-circle, a half a dozen adoring MALES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Voulez-vous coucher avec moi ce soir? Voulez-vous coucher avec moi? Suddenly she becomes aware of a MELLIFLUOUS MALE VOICE overlapping hers. It has a curious bossa nova rhythm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tall and tanned and young and lovely The Girl from Ipanema goes walking And when she passes each guy she passes goes `Aaaah' Ella turns to see: a PENGUIN backlit by the sun, standing HEROICALLY on a little rise, just as WISHFUL did. Ella recognizes those TAPPING FEET. Could this be MUMBLE?She moves closer to investigate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, and I want her so badly How can I tell her I love her? Yes I would give my heart gladly (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But each day when she walks to the sea, She looks straight ahead not at me...."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mumble?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tall and tanned and young and lovely..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (overlapping) Hi Ella, what do you think? Ella, suspicious moves to one side. Mumble moves to block her view. She moves further tound and sees:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hola bonita! Obviously he's been singing while Mumble mimes
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mumble, that's just cheap She turns and heads off. The Adelie starts after her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait up! You and me baby, we can make sweet music. I may be short but I'm a love god...Ooww! Mumble smacks him with the back of a flipper and goes off after Ella himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ella. Wait! She stops. He takes her by the shoulders Shes upset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shakes her head, tearful) When you left without saying goodbye I thought something had happened, then I thought he just doesn't care. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't care? I never stopped thinking about you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then when I saw you singing, for a second I thought...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't sing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. I know. Its impossible. She walks off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I'll show you something better He TAPS an up-tempo, syncopated rhythm on the ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sing something to this!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (her back to him) What's the point. It's embarrassing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just try it. This once. Ella begins to hum Never Can Say Goodbye ironically and without conviction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, that'll work. Just keep it going. The singing ADELIE joins in...acapella, very rhythmic
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...turn around you fool You know I love you more and more..." Right on cue, the rest of the AMIGOS appear on either side of him, singing back-up. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Tell me why is it so Don't wanna let you go I never can say goodbye, no...no no no..." Curious, ELLA TURNS. Framed between the Adelies, Mumble strikes a pose, holds it for a moment... then lets rip. He TAP DANCES...UNINHIBITED, WILD, JOYOUS. The ADELIES accompany him. They know all the moves and it is INFECTIOUS FEET are beginning to tap, couples are beginning to improvise... singing along, trying out the dance steps. Now ELLA is caught up in it. AND MUMBLE IS DANCING LIKE NO PENGUIN HAS EVER DONE BEFORE!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it Ella! This is the song inside me! ELLA is ecstatic. Just when we think the WHOLE COLONY will be swept up into the abandon. A DARK FIGURE steps forward
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bellows)
direction.name: direction

result.ToD: AND MUMBLE IS DANCING LIKE NO PENGUIN HAS EVER DONE BEFORE
result.heading: AND MUMBLE IS DANCING LIKE NO PENGUIN HAS EVER DONE BEFORE

direction.raw_text: ...THIS...DEPRAVITY!!! ELLA STOPS DANCING. MUMBLE misses a beat, loses his footing, trips and goes sliding across the ice to the feet of CARUSO and the ELDERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WHAT IS THE MEANING OF THIS ABOMINATION?!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just showing them Happy Feet
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Happy WHAT?! This is an OUTRAGE! The ADELIES shuffle uncomfortably. Caruso turns to the rest of the emperors (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is exactly this kind of disrespectful, heretic behaviour that has brought the Scarcity upon us! Don't you see...we are being brought to account by the Forefathers!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... The kid was never quite the full Penguin. ... It all began the year he hatched. ... That's right! He's the one who brought the blight!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (astonished) Wait. Wait. You think it's my fault that there are no fish?!! Doing Happy Feet can't cause a food shortage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...then what did?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My own opinion? I think living beyond the ice there are creatures we've never met before Aliens. Mystic Beings. Big, flabby......
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pushing in) ...He has abandoned the faith. ...He has driven the fish away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (protecting Mumble) ...Come on hombre, loosen up, ...the tall guy was just trying to....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't touch me! Heathen!! He BATS the ADELIES aside like skittles. Mumble intervenes
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (enraged) ...Skua talk!! He's talking Skua talk! (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (5)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...He's the spawn of evil!! ...The devil penguin!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is craziness
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Son they're right. Wishful emerges from the crowd
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You too pa?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Truth is, I'm the cause of it. I dropped the egg. I made you how you are. If only you'd come back to us, relinquish the dark side
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Dad. No. What have they done to you. You're talking like Caruso.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just do it. Pray to the Forefathers for forgiveness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. You're nuts. All of you. I'm outa here. MUMBLE walks away. The community part to let him go. Ella chases after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Mumble! Catching up with him
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Its no use Ella. I can't live with that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you live without it? He stops. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (6)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I believe in you, Mumble. But without the huddle we can't make an egg. Without the egg, what are we here for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...True ...That's a big question
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guys. Can Me and Ella be alone for a bit The Adelies give them space
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: OK. Here's what I'm going to do. I'm going to talk an alien. I'm going to find what's causing the shortage
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what about?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Its the only way. You're right. Unless we have food theres no future for any of us - you, me the adelies, anyone
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me a year, just until the next great gathering. If I don't make it back ....at least I tried
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now go back. I love you. Go. Ella returns to the community. As she does so, CARUSO begins to CHANT the Gathering answers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Together we stand"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Divided we freeze." (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (7)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Recite the Wisdoms!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "In the Wisdoms we trust."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "When all others leave..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "We Remain."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Louder. More fervent bretheren. "When the Sun vanishes..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "We Remain." ELLAS watches through tears as the tiny figures of Mumble and the Adelies dwindle to specks and disappear into the mist. THE ICE SHELF Mumble and the Adelies have put the colony far behind, trekking homewards
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me again where we're going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To find the mystic beings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do we know where they live.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll ask Loveday. He's been there. ADELIELAND Most of the Adelies are sitting on nests. The Adeleies and Mumble trek past them a protective mother takes a peck at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Not so close. We got babies on board
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Wow. Does nesting make em touchy (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: They find LOVEDAY at the back of what is left of his PEBBLE PILE. He sits leaning against it...exhausted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...LOVEDAY, you okay?? ...what happened ...Too much boom-boom for one penguin? MUMBLE kicks a bunch of pebbles at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just one question! And I want a straight answer! Where do I find the Mystic Beings? LOVEDAY tries to raise himself up. A tight low gurgling rumbles from his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't he speak? LOVEDAY gurgles and points wildly to the SIX-PACK PLASTIC round his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talisman...sounds like Talisman!! LOVEDAY coughs. His eyes bulge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...He's possessed! ...It's a seizure!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He's choking! The Talisman's gotten way too tight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Why din' you say so? ...Hold on we gonna take it off. ...You pull that side, I pull this side. They tug at the SIX-PACK PLASTIC. LOVEDAY GASPS AND WINCES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop. You're hurting him. The Adelies back off. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any better? LOVEDAY gives a little `so-so' gesture with his flipper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...It not gonna come off. ...Of course it's not! It's sacred!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: where did you get it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...It was bestowed on him. ...By the Mystic Beings! LOVEDAY shakes his head sadly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They didn't bestow it on you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Poor Guy. ...He don't know what he's saying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If it wasn't bestowed, what happened? LOVEDAY mimes swimming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Oh, this one's easy. ...He swam.... ...On his Hectic Journey of Delightenment... ...To the Forbidding Shore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then....? LOVEDAY mimes the talisman going over his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Well to me that's gotta be bestowing. LOVEDAY shakes his head, `no'. He stretches his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You looked up and...... It just got caught around your neck? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...No way. No. He's the revered one ...He speaking symbolically. LOVEDAY hangs his head. A TEAR slides down his beak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gently) Loveday, did you ever meet a Mystic Being? Really? Beaten, LOVEDAY shakes his head `No' The Adelies are stunned into silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But this thing was made by someone. And if we find them, they could take it off. LOVEDAY looks up, a glimmer of hope in his eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So where do we Go, Loveday Loveday Then he makes a strange "Oi, Oi, Oi" sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my! Now he thinks he's an Elephant Seal LOVEDAY nods and points towards the mountains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wants to go to the top of the mountain. LOVEDAY shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The forbidden place is over the mountains... LOVEDAY nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...In the land of the Elephant Seals!!? LOVEDAY gestures wildly with his flippers!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Beyond the land of the Elephant Seals!!? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (4) LOVEDAY nods `YES!!' and falls back in exhaustion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So who's coming
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oi A MOUNTAIN RIDGE The Adelies labour uphill into the wind. LOVEDAY is lagging behind, breathing hard. Even MUMBLE and the AMIGOS are puffing with the effort of the climb. Music Over: He aint heavy he's my brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Stop. Enough. We must've gone past it ...Past? Don't kid me. We're not even close. Then on the wind comes a fiant `Oi, Oi, Oi'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hear that?! As they crest the peak, sure enough, down below: the LAND of the ELEPHANT SEALS. Thousands of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Refresh my memory do elephant seals eat penguin? ...No, no...jus' krill and fish. ...Sure of your facts are you? Not waiting, Mumble launches himself over the other side, slip-sliding down the mountain. One by one the ADELIES follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well I guess we're about to find out THE LAND OF THE ELEPHANT SEALS The beach is literally heaving. MUMBLE and the ADELIES come tumbling and sliding right up to two HUGE SEALS. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (big-bellied, booming southern voice) Well roll me over and call me a dugong. What the heck have we got here The Adelies bunch up behind Mumble
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, we need directions...to the Forbidden Shore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. Just git yourselves over them there hills I'd come with you myself but...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woah Woah. You aint told em half of it: over them hills, beyond the great glacier, `n' through the blizzard country. The Good Ole Boys are into ONE-UPMANSHIP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyhow. Its its forbidden to go there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard its forbidden to ask how to get there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're looking for the Mystic Beings
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mystic Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aliens, the ones who made this. He indicates the SIX-PACK PLASTIC around LOVEDAY'S neck. SEAL 1 lowers it's massive head down to face LOVEDAY. Wheezing he examines the plastic with first with one eye, then the other, before announcing his verdict.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blizzard Walkers! Cut you up soon as look at you. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cut you up before they look at you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could they be taking our fish?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could be!? I heard they'd take a whole penguin, rip its skin right off and turn it into mush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh! That's a Picnic! I hear tell they'd take a baby seal and club it to death. With their bare clubs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh! Clubbing's a Clambake! My Granpappy says they been known to skin a seal from snout to tail in a hot second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Granpappy don't know squat! What I hear they take your sorry carcass, melt you down, burn you up, take your fur `n' fat and turn you into a wide variety of useful items!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hell with "useful" Those critters'd y turn you into a food item! Little popsicle things! Ya hear me? One day you're a big ole whale and the next minute, FUNFOOD!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But If your grandpappys saw them and they survived, maybe they're not so fierce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You calling me a liar son?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's calling your grandpappy a liar. And you know what, Maybe he's right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why you. Flop over here and say that! They start fighting, lunging and flopping on each other (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on Loveday, lets go
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (running to catch up) ...Go where? ...didn't you hear what he said ...Its Forbidden
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They don't know. They've never been there
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop! I'm hearing voices. The mystical guys. They say: "Your life is perfectly good as it is...forget this stupid mission". MUMBLE and LOVEDAY keep trekking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ramon. That was embarrassing, man. And reluctantly, he trails after them. As do...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Oh no, don' do this to us. ...I'm a lover not a fighter ...The first sign of Popsicles or funfood of any kind, I turn round and go back THE BLIZZARD COUNTRY MUMBLE, LOVEDAY and the ADELIES are tiny specks, struggling over a series of great ridges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So we walked ... and walked .. and kept walking. Over the hills and into Blizzard country A SNOW STORM breakes over them. A screaming wind brings total WHITE-OUT. The Penguins have to shout to make themselves heard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Oh man! This is no place for a penguin! ...We should be migrating out to sea by now! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need to huddle!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huddle??!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Form a moving circle! Share the cold, share the warmth! He turns his back to the wind. Immediately the Adelies form a STRAIGHT LINE down-wind from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Oh yeah, nice. ...That's definitely better. ...Good call big guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said a circle! They form a little huddle, but as soon as Mumble moves from the upwind position, the Adelies complain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...No, no. This can't be right! ...It was better the other way. They scurry back into a straight line behind Mumble who cops the FULL BLAST of the GALE. He gives up and marches off into the driving snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hey! ...What happened to the Huddle?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shouts back) Just keep moving! Toboggan, if you have to!! The others lie down, propelling themselves forwards on their fronts
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Oh no, now I got chest pain ...tell you, this is a good way to get snow blind (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...just keep moving or you'll get my beak up your butt FLARE OUT TO WHITE The blizzard has passed. An eerie stillness. One by one the Adelies get to their feet and waddle forwards to where Mumble and Loveday stand, gazing into the distance. They have finally reached the sea again
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think this is it? The Forbidden Shore? LOVEDAY chokes out a `yes'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ....The way I feel": the "frostbitten" shore ....So what are those black things?. Close to the waters edge, the outline of several buildings AN ABANDONED WHALING STATION The PENGUINS venture through it, dwarfed by the old flensing- sheds, the chimneys and boiling-vats. Its all now abandoned, and half concealed by snow. Around and above them, there are HOOKS, CHAINS, rusting twisted METALWORK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello?! Is there anyone out there? An ominous GROANING as some rusting metal plate moves in the wind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...No need to shout. ...Yeah, somebody might hear you. ...I think we seen all there is to see round here. LOVEDAY is looking at something at his feet. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it? There, imbedded in the ice: another six pack holder. THE SEA ICE Mumble and the Adelies venture out onto the weak ice beyond the whaling station, finding more and more of the strange artefacts: a piece of nylon rope, a soda can, a boot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They must be here somewhere. They wouldn't leave all this stuff lying around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe they invisible. FURTHER ON They've reached the edge of the sea-ice. LOVEDAY croaks a warning. He points out to sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that? A WAVE has appeared on the glassy surface of the sea. It is coming towards them, FAST like the bow wave of an IMMENSE UNDERWATER CREATURE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A whale?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As long as it's a good whale, not the other kind. The wave is coming CLOSER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What other kind?!! A massive BLACK DORSAL FIN breaks the surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ones with teeth!! The PENGUINS are off and running... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: The DORSAL FIN keeps coming like the blade of a demonic carving knife. Then the monstrous fin disappears and KABOOM! The killer whale breaches the ice AHEAD of them, cutting off their retreat. They are left stranded on a free-floating ICE FLOE THE ADELIES ...Jump! ...Swim for it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!! Stay on the ice pad where its safe The little floe is wobbling crazily
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You call this safe amigo? ...Maybe we should split up. ...You split up I'm staying right here. The KILLER WHALE breaches again, rising like a tower block out of the ocean.
direction.name: direction
