direction.raw_text: Woooaaaahhh!! The ICE PAD flips, flinging them into the water like a handful of peanuts. IN THE SEA The PENGUINS head for shore , swimming for their lives. LOVEDAY, thrashing and wheezing, is unable to keep up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stops)
direction.name: direction

result.heading: IS THE MEANING OF THIS ABOMINATION
MUMBLE BACK OFF, YA SCREWY-ASS FLIPPERBIRD

direction.raw_text: ! LOVEDAY!! He swims back. The KILLER WHALE is about to take them both in one bite. MUMBLE pulls LOVEDAY aside, but he's not quite quick enough: one of the Whale's outer teeth catches LOVEDAY by the SIX-PACK PLASTIC and he is DRAGGED AWAY, tethered to the KILLER WHALE like Captain Ahab. The WHALE thrashes around wildly trying to dislodge the hapless little penguin until... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: LOVEDAY is FLUNG high, high into the air and...SPLASHES DOWN some distance away. The KILLER WHALE is left with the SIX-PACK PLASTIC lodged in its teeth. ICE SHELF MUMBLE and LOVEDAY scramble onto the ice exhausted. Wondering where the next attack will come from, the AMIGOS huddle nearby. Suddenly the ICE SHELF CRACKS OPEN and the KILLER WHALE soars right over the top of them It hits the water but does not stop, just keeps going right on out to sea. The Penguins have no time to reflect on their good fortune. Theres an EARTH SHATTERING NOISE behind them . Turning they see a vast BLACK SHAPE, a hundred feet high, coming at them through the fog. The ADELIES flee across the ice. MUMBLE stands transfixed by the BIG BLACK SHIP towering above him. On the deck he sees HUMAN FIGURES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aliens?! The pack-ice is BUCKLING AND EXPLODING ahead of the GREAT JUGGERNAUT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop! Please!.... From a safe distance the ADELIES stop and look on in amazement as Mumble stands his ground, shouting up at THE SHIP as it advances towards him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...It's very important! The ICE beneath his feet OPENS UP, Mumble topples into the gap and The SHIP PASSES OVER HIM, huge propellers churning, leaving a channel ninety feet wide. MUMBLE resurfaces. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WE...HAVE...TO...TALK! He chases after the ship. THE ADELIES chase after Mumble...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...AMIGO-O-O-O! ...LET IT GO-O-O-O-O!! Already the ship is half a mile away. THE ICEBERG Beyond the last of the ice floes is THE WORLD'S TALLEST ICEBERG. MUMBLE hurls himself onto it and starts scrambling up its precipitous sides. THE ADELIES follow, struggling to keep up. THE SUMMIT MUMBLE's POV: THE BIG BLACK SHIP has joined TWO OTHERS about a mile away. The Adelies join him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You found them, you found Aliens! ...Now we go back tell everybody who's taking the fish. Mumble's     eyes remain fixed on the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Don't feel bad Tall Guy. ...They were just too fast. Too big. ...Too everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They've stopped!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mumble. I owe you my life amigo. And I say this because I admire and deeply respect you. If you are thinking what I think you are thinking. You are out of your crazy head
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say Hi to Ella for me (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You say Hi. Come back and say Hi to her yourself Mumble turns, takes a few paces back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. One other thing. You guys
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Suddenly, MUMBLE turns to the precipice and runs as fast as he can...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excelsi yah!!! As he launches himself into space... WIDE SHOT The tiny penguin soaring off the top of the ICEBERG. THE ADELIES rush to the edge as, far below Mumble HITS THE WATER. And vanishes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...can you believe that ...brought us all this way and killed himself ...no he didn't! look! Far out he has surfaced and is swimming strongly in direction of the BIG BLACK SHIP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...A dive like that, and still he lives! ... Yeah like when he did his Happy Feet, his feet had wings. ...A normal penguin could never have done it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't think we should go with him
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Don't sweat it Revered One. Many are called, few are chosen. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ..Hey, how tall you think the Tall Guy was? ...Who could say? Four times my height at least... Loveday follows behind
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: About this Revered One stuff, you guys
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe just call me Pedro THE OPEN SEA MUMBLE PLOUGHS THROUGH a rolling sea: towering waves block everything from view but on the crests he catches sight of... THREE BLACK SHIPS, far ahead, but stationary, as if waiting for him. LATER He's getting closer. The ships are only half a mile away when Something rises from the deep, threatening to engulf him: a HUGE NET, TEEMING WITH FISH. Mumble shoots out of the way, just avoiding being caught as. UP AHEAD The great NET FULL OF FISH breaks the surface of the water and is winched on board.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yells)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! YOU CAN'T DO THAT!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! THE SCARCITY!! As if in response the ship's ENGINES START UP again and the sea around him erupts in churning foam. Swamped by the wake, Mumble goes under. When he resurfaces, THE SHIP is already on its way. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: HEY YOU THINK YOU'RE GONNA GET AWAY WITH THIS?!! NOT IF I CAN HELP IT YOU SHIT- SQUIRTER ALIEN CREEPS. He takes a deep breath and resumes his pursuit. OPEN OCEAN The SEAS are MOUNTAINOUS. There is no sign of the ship now, nor of land. MUMBLE swims up the side of each wave, over its foaming crest and down into the deep dark valley below. LATER The air is full of spray. Choking, MUMBLE ducks under the water. UNDERWATER Its peaceful here. Then something moves beside him and turns with a start to see: A MASSIVE EYE!! A BLUE WHALE entirely fills his field of vision. It sings a few booming Wagnerian notes. Its voice is almost deafening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too loud. He surfaces, spluttering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too loud! A VOICE calls to him from above. Mumble looks up. An ALBATROSS hovers overhead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's looking for a mate, mate. And these days, I tell you they're few and far between From the ALBATROSS' aerial view, Mumble looks tiny next to the MASSIVE BULK of the Blue Whale. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talking of which, I never seen a penguin this far out. Watch you don't hit The Convergence mate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Convergence?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where the cold water meets the warm, mate. Once you cross it, there's no getting' back. What you tryinmg to prove anyway?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm trying to talk to the Aliens!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the black iceberg. The ones taking all the fish!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Them. Fish is just the start of it Mate. Them aliens is the ones who took out the whales.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They kill whales! That's impossible
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Straight up mate. Biggest creatures ever lived. Decimated, mate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So if I wanted to talk to them, where would I go
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anywhere and everywhere. Over the sea, under the sea, Jees, I've even seen them fly. The great southland's swarming with em
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's that. Do you think the Whale would take me there? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2) The Blue Whale responds with a long mournful "NO-O-O-O" which the Albatross does not need to translate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way mate, he won't go anywhere near `em. And neither should you. Mumble hesitates, bobbing on the water, weighing the warnings. He makes up his mind and strikes out again swimming towards the convergence. The Albatross, hovering on the wing, watches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't say I didn't warn you The ALBATROSS wheels away. As MUMBLE fights on through the huge choppy waves, the Whale's Wagnerian song booms out, EERIE and FORLORN. THE CONVERGENCE We see from above, the BLUE WHALE turning as well, changing course to avoid a change in the texture and colour of the water stretching in a line, as far as the eye can see. MUMBLE swims RIGHT ACROSS THE LINE. A VAST OCEAN MUMBLE is a mere DOT now as the GREAT CURRENTS capture him and sweep him away. We pull back through the clouds until the very CURVATURE OF THE EARTH is visible: a blue horizon with no land in sight. SMALL POLLUTED BEACH On the HIGH-WATER MARK, amongst the rubbish and the oil slick, we see what looks like a dead animal. It is MUMBLE. A creature in RED GUMBOOTS approaches. Its small hand reaches down and nudges him with a stick. MUMBLE moans and the gumboots RUN AWAY, shouting something unintelligible. With great difficulty, Mumble raises his head to try to see more. Sunlight flares, bleaching to white, as he LOSES CONSCIOUSNESS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A WHITE ROOM Scientific books and specimens of birds in large bottles on shelves line the walls. MUMBLE, eyes closed, is lying on a stainless steel table. He opens his eyes to the brilliant glare of an examination lamp. There is movement around him. Voices whispering in an alien tongue. A FIGURE IN WHITE bends over him cleaning the oil from his feathers with detergent. MUMBLE squawks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I finally saw one, the Alien was even more hideous than I'd imagined A very pretty FEMALE SCIENTIST is smiling down at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... frontways eyes, no feathers. Big teeth with blood around them. Strange fleshy beak. A meat eater
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (terrified) The - fish - are - ours. Understand? But all the SCIENTIST sees is a squawking penguin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't live without them! The SCIENTIST produces a syringe and squirts some of it's contents in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Speak Adelie? Skua-talk? Another SCIENTIST holds him still while the needle is administered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no! Not the pointy thing! Drowsy now, he is eased into a PADDED CAGE. The SCIENTISTS close the lid, and secure it with straps. IN THE CARGO HOLD We hear a feeble thumping from inside. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Pull back to reveal Mumble's box on a shelf among crates and luggage. Fade in engine noise over as.... ENDLESS SKY A 747 drones across the screen, eastwards into the night. DARKNESS
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I woke in darkness. Unable to move. Was I dead? And if I was dead, where was that light coming from Like the light at the end of a tunnel. As if in a dream, MUMBLE ambles towards it. Emerging into PENGUIN HEAVEN Bright BLUE SKY, sparkling WHITE CLIFFS OF ICE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. They brought me home His voice ECHOES back at him, with a mocking edge. There is something unusual about this place. A plump penguin waddles by
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, where are we.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heaven. Where d'you think?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. So we're dead. Right
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dunno. Don't care. We got food. We got water. You hear a seal now and then, but you never meet one. Perfect. Mumble is looking around, trying to figure it out
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fish!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: A fish hits him on the head. A moment later he's knocked flat by a sudden rush of PENGUINS: Chinstraps, Rock-hoppers, Adelies, King penguins, emerging from holes in the rock face
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fish time. Fish time! Lying on his back he sees fish tumble from the sky. It's RAINING FISH!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every day after that, it rained fish in the afternoon. His POV, Load after load of fish tumbling out of a clear sky UNDERWATER Fish hit the surface and sink
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fish on land and fish underwater. Mumble pursues one of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sometime you got a live one but there was nowhere really to chase it He swims SLAP BANG into a sheet of thick glass. ALIEN FACES are pressed against it. Mumble yells and shoots to the surface. THE PENGUIN ENCLOSURE High up he sees the viewing gallery. A great CROWD of ALIENS staring and chattering
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aliens everywhere, watching you eat, watching you sleep Mumble backs away and knocks into the PAINTED HORIZON. He puts out a wing to steady himself and notices a metal tag on it. This place is beginning to upset him. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yells at the aliens) What have you done to my wing! This is not my home! I want to get out of here! The other penguins stand around, immobile, chomping fish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guess he's new here THE PENGUIN ENCLOSURE Caption: A year later Specators POV: Mumble stands around, like the others, ignoring the aliens, chomping fish His POV: Day after day, the view constantly the same, except for the groupings of spectators high in the viewing Gallery
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After a while, you learn to stop fighting it. Stop protesting, take the knocks. CU Mumble: A camera flashes. A fish hits him, he doesn't flinch
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...just take what comes and live inside your mind THE SAME/ PASSAGE OF TIME Another day and another. Night follows day follows night. Spectators come and go. The penguins stand like statues. Though bubbles begin to appear above Mumbles head, snapshots of his past experiences
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sometimes I thought about dad and mum. Sometimes the Amigos, and others I'd met along the way. But mostly I thought about Ella, wondering who she ended up with. Whether she had enough food to eat. whether she still remembered our song. In the though bubble, Ella has appeared singing never can say goodbye. Mumbles feet begin shuffling to the rythm
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SPECTATORS GALLERY Most of the specators are leaving but one young girls stops and stares
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look Mommy! It's dancing! She bangs on the glass in her excitement. PENGUIN ENCLOSURE Mumble, woken from his reverie, looks up and sees her looking at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? What did I do? The little girl who is pointing at mumbles feet. Mumble looks down, realizes what his feet are doing, looks up again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You like that? Well how about this. He does a more elaborate step. The Mother shouts in disbelief. Various other specators come back and join her. Mumbles fellow captives are unimpressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh-Oh, another one gone troppo
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think its infectious
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I sure hope not They shuffle away IN THE SPECTATORS GALLERY. The aliens, in contrast, are loving it. Already a crowd has gathered, laughing and clapping. NEXT DAY The Gallery is packed. Mumble keeps dancing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NEXT DAY Theres a riot going on up there. People fighting to get a view. Newspaper reporters, TV cameras. The other penguins in the enclosure have moved back, giving Mumble more space. Every specattor is focussed on him. Mumble is focussed on the spectators.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Yes. At last something was happening. I was finally getting through to them! THE TRANSPORTER BOX A squawking Mumble is thrust inside and the lid slams shut on him. Kerchunk. THE EMPEROR COLONY Silence, then across the vast expanse a TINY FIGURE appears on the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...What's that? ...Where? ...Coming from the Inland! A couple of Penguins watch the approaching figure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Is it a Penguin? ...Is it one of ours? LATER Mumble approaches the two sentries. The colony is much diminished: only small groups scattered here and there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, where is everybody!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who wants to know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I used to live here. When's the Great Gathering? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it. I guess
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is all that's left? Other penguins are gathering to scrutinise the stranger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... So Who's this? ...Kinda small for an emperor. ...(suspicious) Where did you say you were from? Then a female penguin bursts out of the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mumble?! Its Mumble!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ella! Is it you. You haven't changed a bit. As he speaks, his eyes are drawn to the huge number of FLUFFY CHICKS following behind her
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are these all yours?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're my singing students.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So. You never....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course not. I was waiting for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But that's fantastic. I've got so much to tell you - to tell everyone. (To the gathering crowd) I found out who's been causing the Scarcity!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know who's been taking our fish! I made contact with Aliens! They're coming here. Right behind me. Listen. They listen. Above the wind   faint electronic BEEPING SOUND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Who's doing all the shouting ...Its Mumble. He's worse than before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, honestly Aliens will be here soon! You have to believe me. We came in a big hollow bird and they landed on the ice and.... CARUSO bursts through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You again! And still full of the same old nonsense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But its true!! The BEEP is quite audible now - a little faster and louder. Curious, Ella ambles round behind mumble tro see what's making the noise
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move along everyone. Pay no attention. There's no such thing as aliens
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So who fixed him up with this. She turns him around to reveal some kind of circuit board glued to his back: a small aerial, winking red lights. A TRANSMITTER. A gasp of fear and astonishment from the penguins. Caruso is momentarily speechless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Does it hurt? ....Its not made of feathers thats for sure ...what's it gonna do (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's so they can find me. (cocks an ear) That's them now. Listen. A distant rumbling, like some monstrous cataclysm is approaching
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You led them here. Are you crazy!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said they didn't exist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'll slaughter us. Head for the sea!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Do this. Do Happy feet. He starts tap dancing. The penguins are torn, between Caruso's instructions and Mumbles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Its what they understand. They can't talk, they can't sing. They speak with their feet. Do it. A few adventurous souls begin to copy him, out of fear if nothing else. As they do so, the sky begins to darken. A strange whirling wind starts whipping the snow around them. The very earth seems to be shaking under them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now look what you've done!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...its the end of the world. ....Its all Mumbles fault. I told you Wishful rounds on them angrily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just do what the kid says. They start dancing. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (4) Caruso has climbed a small hillock and is ranting like an old testament prophet
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Recite the wisdoms! "Together we stand". "Divided We Freeze". Mumble and Ella are dancing through the community
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, everyone! Happy Feet! It's our only chance!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "When all others leave, we Remain
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! FEET!! HAPPY FEET!! The tide is beginning to turn in his favour
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it! Excellent! Riba Riba, penguinos! Shake those hips. Come on, bust a move!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adhere to the wisdoms!! The Ancients will protect us As he shouts his he is blown off his feet by a tremendous gust of wind Caruso tumbles head over heels as a massive Chinook helicopter rises over the hirizon, its massive rotors mashing the air. It swoops down over the penguin nation and lands a little distance away. Music Over: Wanna Dance with Somebody. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (5) Now the entire emperor community are dancing for all they are worth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ....Aliens. ... I never doubted it for a moment Mrs Astrakhan dances past
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More feelink. BE SPONTANUOUS!! Wishful dances over to her, his eyes on Mumble and Ella
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dancing) You know who that is? That's my boy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dancing) Know him? He ees my star pupol!
direction.name: direction

result.heading: YOU THINK YOU'RE GONNA GET AWAY WITH THIS
NOT IF I CAN HELP IT YOU SHIT- SQUIRTER ALIEN CREEPS
OF EMPEROR PENGUIN DANCING WITH PURE, ABANDONED JOY

direction.raw_text: ! BY THE CHINOOK HUMAN scientists disembark. Skidoos are kicked into life. We TRAVEL WITH THE SKIDOOS across the ICE-SHELF to the colony Scientists POV: As they stop, lower their hoods and gaze in astonishment. One of them lifts a video cam to record THOUSANDS OF EMPEROR PENGUIN DANCING WITH PURE, ABANDONED JOY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From that day on, No one quite knows how it happened, but the black icebergs began to disappear and the fish became abundant once more. A CONFERENCE ROOM Suited figures are seated round a large table, watching as IMAGES of the DANCING PENGUIN COLONY play on a video screen. Without the music it's less obviously a dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...So what do you reckon? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, quite extraordinary. (stares at the screen) some kind of neurological disorder? a nutritional deficiency perhaps. We'd certainly back the long-term study.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the international treaty?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. This is exactly the leverage we need for an embargo. No fishing whatsoever...legal, illegal, sanctioned, whatever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So we all step up policing of the pirate factory ships. And we pressure that country to stop their so-called `experimental' fishing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, if our government asks your government to approach their government to call off their fleet...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better if their government hear it from our government via your government...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the heck. The amount of publicity this is generating, they'd have world war three if they didn't stop. THE COLONY In the confusion of penguins we find MUMBLE, ELLA and their chick
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ella's gave up teaching to look after our chick. We take turns looking after her and going to get the fish. As we watch, Ella moves off, joining the great to and fro of penguins along the highway to the sea. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: MUMBLE covers his chick protectively, watrching his wife walk away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I worry about her, sure. Theres so much big stuff out there it can be kind of frightening. We are pulling back now, back from the colony, back from Antarctica.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the way I see it. Theres so much out there we don't understand..., SPACE Still pulling back ....the stuff you think is small stuff could actually be the big stuff. Keep pulling back from the world, the solar system,       the galaxy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or am I not making sense here? Further back. Our galaxy is framed in something like a bomb- sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there a problem? I thought this one was barren. IN THE DOME We`re somewhere otherworldly, inside a clear dome the size of a stadium, with a view of the heavens. In the centre of this space, always just out of shot, two illdefined figures are talking, subtitled:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More or less. But one of the stars we're harvesting supports these things here. Projected somehow in mid-air A 3-D image of Times square in winter with tiny people milling around in black coats (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction
